Title: The Walls of Malapaga
Writer: Jean Aurenche (adaptation), Pierre Bost (adaptation), Cesare Zavattini (screenplay), Suso Cecchi D'Amico (screenplay), Alfredo Guarini (screenplay)
Actors: Jean Gabin, Isa Miranda, Vera Talchi, Andrea Checchi
Plot: A French fugitive arrives in Genoa, where he becomes entangled with an Italian woman and her daughter.
